text: Mark David Hollis (4 January 1955 - 25 February 2019) was an English musician and singer-songwriter. He was known as the co-founder, lead singer and main songwriter of the synthpop/post-rock band Talk Talk. His 1998 debut solo album was his best known work."A record that floors me each time." Hollis had largely retired from the recording industry in the late 1990s. On 25 February 2019, it was announced that Hollis died at the age of 64 from a short-illness at his Wimbledon, London home.Very sorry to hear the news that #MarkHollis of #TalkTalk has died. He was behind some of the finest albums of the 1980s / early 1990s.
